page.title: 09LIFE STYLES - RELAXATION
page.content:
Of our survey, 88% of families go out together on average once a fortnight. Their outings are for a variety of purposes: visiting relatives, sport, day trips and holidays, meals, walking and shopping. Individual adults (76%) indicated that they regularly go out alone for sport, meals, dancing, visiting pubs and visiting friends.
Our team also indicated their preferred activities - watching TV, helping out on the nearby farm, riding bicycles, sport, action games, playing with action men, playing with dolls, dressing up, shooting and fishing. Our team comprises children aged from 5 - 11years, the majority being boys.
